"okay!" said Plintissa, she ran down to the weapons room and looked at the
weapons.....she found a gun that fired bullets like a machine gun...but the
bullets explode into fire upon impact and have freeze bombs inside which are
set off by the fire........they freeze opposition!.......she took it
instantly.....she also seen a guilotine mace on the wall.....she took it and
stuffed both into her back compartment.....she was being weighed down but
wasn't fast to begin with..so she decided to bear it......she walked back to
the bridge...... "hi Dinbobot, and Tavatron! we meet...again,
MON!....heeheehee!!......." Suukie said, suddenly jumping onto the
bridge!...... "i'm done being repaired!.....now we meeet again, fighting is
what i'm prepaired!....." he said......Plintissa slapped herself in the
face...maybe she was sleeping and she could wake up and make this thing go
away.....
----- Original Message -----
From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 27, 2000 10:53 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> * Iron Raptor smiled slightly as she received the transmission from
> Plintissa, so she had decided to come back after all.
> She sighed as she entered into the bridge and saw her squid friend.*
>
> " Weapon's hold on level 3, just down from the CR chambers. Pick something
> and head out to the Island's borders."
>
> * She looked over and saw Tavatron and Dinobot, so her other friend had
made
> one of her own. She smiled and looked back at Plintissa...*
>
> " Well, go. Get a weapon and I'll be waiting right here for you."
>
